name: getIssueTypeScreenSchemeProjectAssociations
description:
Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of issue type screen schemes and, for each issue type screen scheme, a list of the projects that use it.

Only issue type screen schemes used in classic projects are returned.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

startAt.description: The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).

maxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

projectId.description: The list of project IDs. To include multiple projects, separate IDs with ampersand: `projectId=10000&projectId=10001`.

$ul: **isLast**: Whether this is the last page.
**maxResults**: The maximum number of items that could be returned.
**nextPage**: If there is another page of results, the URL of the next page.
**startAt**: The index of the first item returned.
